questions.question: Best structure for a client-facing chart deck slide:
options: Insight title → visual → one-sentence takeaway → action
questions.explanation: Lead with the 'so what' and keep the visual clean.

questions.question: If Combined Strength rises from 3.3/10 to 5.0/10 and your policy scales linearly to a max of 8/10, what fraction of max size is now indicated?
Write a one-line takeaway for a regime flip from Bear→Sideways.
questions.answer_text: Downtrend pressure eased; we moved from defense to neutral positioning pending confidence.
